name: Carrots & Bears
description:
This is my first project using Godot 4.
I made this quick game to get used to the game engine and its mechanisms.

Credits:

Tileset: 1-bit pack by Kenney https://kenney.nl/assets/1-bit-pack
Music: 8-bit Gameboy Songs by TipTopTomCat https://tiptoptomcat.itch.io/8-bit-gameboy-songs-gb-studio
